titleStmt.title: To the honourable the House of Commons now assembled in Parliament The humble petition of divers knights, esquires, ministers, gentlemen, and freeholders of the Countie Palatine of Lancaster.

notesStmt.note: Thanks Parliament for appointing Lord Wharton Lord-Lieutenant of the county. They fear an invasion of the Irish rebels and ask for various defensive measures. -- Steele.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
